name: Laughing Lasso
description:
Welcome to the Wild West, partner! Get ready to saddle up and ride into a hilarious adventure with this  first person comedy sandbox game.

In this game, you'll take on the role of a quirky cowboy with a sense of humor as you explore the vast, open world of the Wild West. From dusty towns to sprawling ranches, there's no shortage of places to explore and mischief to make.

Take on odd jobs, cause chaos, and interact with a colorful cast of characters as you navigate the challenges of life in the Wild West. Whether you're dueling with bandits, rounding up cattle, or just trying to survive the harsh terrain, you'll do it all with a smile on your face and a quip on your lips.

---------------------

Made in 3 Days for the April Fools Gamejam

---------------------

Controls:
W/A/S/D : Move

E : Interact

LMB : Use/Gather Task based Objects

RMB : Aim Weapon / Fire Weapon / Reload


---------------------

Recommendations:

- Use Mozilla Firefox as Browser.
